title: Strategies for Utilizing Social Networking Sites in Ubiquitous Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A course focused on enhancing collaboration and knowledge sharing in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the learning usefulness of social networking sites through a TAM (Technology Acceptance Model)-based analysis
Learners can design three or more social networking activity strategies to enhance collective efficacy
Learners can build an online collaborative system for solving practical problems in science using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
